oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Francis Martin telegram to Cyrus Griffin Martin, 1917 April 30
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Martin, Francis
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Telegram dated 1917 April 30, from Francis Martin in Chattanooga, Tennessee, to Cyrus Griffin Martin at Columbia University, New York, acknowledging receipt of telegrams and date of arrival on train.

United States. Army
